thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 52 of 522
thread.title: Mountain Mel

author: Mountain Mel
title: Mountain Mel
text: I've been eyeballing Fabletics for a while. The website is super easy to use, great layout and pics. I finally lost those 10 pounds that had been eluding me, so what better way to reward myself than with some new workout wear. I've been on the hunt for a good bra. I would have bought more of the Signature Collection bras, under the 50% Off Signature Styles but once all my selections were in the cart, only one bra was discounted. Also, the outfits were priced incredibly low but it seems that only one would be at the discounted price listed. It was a bit confusing. Needless to say, I am super excited to try out my purchases. Hopefully they are as amazing as they look!
